Description: Rim sherd of North Ionian pottery plate or shallow bowl; plain upturned rim; glazed fired orange. Top of rim glazed; interior: key maeander band at rim; to the centre, between bands with added red and white lines, frieze of lotus flowers and buds with traces of added red; in tondo, leaves with dots; exterior: six regularly spaced bands.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. VII, no. 3)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.790)
